content: (pattakkaaran madbahaayil thronosinte mumpaake kizhakkottabhimukhamaayi nilkkunnu. Iruvashangallilum shushrooshakkaar katthicha mezhukuthirikall pidikkunnu. Nerchakkaar katthicha thirikall pidichu kondu nadayude thaazhe nilkkanam.)

Pattakkaaran: Aardrathayullllavanaaya kartthaave, ninte karunayude vaathil nyangallkku thurannu tharename. Nyangall ninne aashrayamaakkiyirikkunnathinaal nyangall lajichupokumaaraakaruthe. Nyangalle rakshikkukayum, sakala durithangallilninnum veendukollllukayum cheyyaname. Manushya kulatthinte rakshakanum veendeduppukaaranum nee aakunnuvallo. Nyangall ninnil sangkethappedunnathinaal nyangallodu daya cheyyaname. Nyangallodu ottum kopikkayumaruthe. Nyangallude rahasyavum parasyavumaaya kallangkangallum kuravukallum nyangallodu orkkaruthe. Nee nyangallude daivavum nyangall ninte janavum kaivelayum aakayaalum ninte naamam nyangallude mel villikkappettirikkunnathinaalum nyangalle samrakshichu ninakku pathivullllaprakaaram aardrathayodum anukampayodum koode nyangallude shathrukkallil ninnu nyangalle veendukollllaname. Ninte pakkal apekshaasvaathantryavum sampreethiyumullllavallaaya ninne prasavicha parishuddha kanyakamariyaam ammayude praarththhanayaal, utthamane! Daya thonni nyangallude mel anugraham cheyyaname.

Yugakaalangallilokkeyilum
Maravaayu sthhithicheythoru marmmam
Nirmmalaye! Kaalatthikavil
Nin savidham vellivaayu vannu
Doothatthalavan gabareeyel
Madhurasvaratthil ninnodaayu
Abhivaadyam cheythothiyidam
Vitha cheyyaa vayale! Modi-
Kkeriyaathulllloru mullmarame!
Saakshyatthin pettakavum nee
Athir kaanaatthaazhame modi-
Kkambaramettum sopaanam
/tyaakkobu thaathan darshicha
/tvaanetthum shreniye modi-
/tkkakame daivikamaam mannaa
/tnikshepithacheppe modi-
Kkaadaamin paapam pokkaan
kaaranamaayolle modi-
Cheeduka kartthan nin koode.
(anantaram pattakkaaran padinyaarottu thirinyu madbahaayude vallavingkal ninnukondu ee ekbaa chollunnu.)

Mannaa nikshepithacheppum-
Mulla poondora-haron vadiyum
ullkkondoru niyamappetti
Shlemmon than-roomaalumiva
/tnin saa-myam daivajananee
/tdrshdaa-nte nibiyanmaarum /tvellipaadaal shleehanmaarum ninnullmarmmam kaanichu-
Ninnude suthanaam mashihaaye
Sthuthi cheyyunnadiyaar nyangall thaanennum va-ndyan thanne.
(padinyaarottu thirinyuninnukonduthanne kai uyartthi ee apeksha chollunnu)

Shuddhathayude shuddhasthhalatthu sakala vishuddhanmaarkkum upariyaayi sthhithicheyyunna vachanamaam daivatthe prasavicha nirmmalayum sakalatthilum mahatthvamullllavallumaaya maathaave! Nyangalle ellaavareyum sakala duഃkhangallil ninnum samrakshikkuvaan ninte ekajaathanodu nyangallkkuvendi apekshikkename. Krpa niranya maathaave! Apekshikkunnavarude yaachanakalle upekshikkaatthavalle! Enningane ninnodu nilavillichapekshikkunna sakalarum ninte maddhyasthhathayaal varuvaanirikkunna sakala shikshakallil ninnum samrakshikkappedaname. Nyangallude naathhayaakunna kanyakaye! Shuddhimathiyum shreshdhayumaaya ninnodu nyangall apekshikkunnu

Ninnil ninnu janichavanaaya puthran nyangallude balaheenathakalle pariharikkukayum rogangalle saukhyamaakkukayum, karakalle maayichukallayukayum aathmaakkalle shuddheekarikkukayum, niroopanangalle sphudam cheyyukayum, chintakalle vedippaakkukayum cheyyuvaan nyangallkku vendi apekshikkename. Avan nyangallude bandhanangalle azhikkukayum paathakalle sharippedutthukayum nadapadikalle sthhirappedutthukayum kadangalle veettukayum kuravukalle neekkikkallayukayum cheyyumaaraakatte. Krpa niranya maathaave! Ninte ekajaathanaaya puthranodulllla ninte yaachanayaal nyangallude balaheenathakall neengi nyangall shakthippedaname. Vrddhajanangall samrakshikkappedaname. Yauvvanakkaar kaatthukollllappedaname. Sthreepurushanmaar daivabhakthiyullllavaraakaname. Shishukkall vallartthappedukayum sameepasthhar samrakshikkappedukayum cheyyaname. Vidoorasthhar samaadhaanatthode thirichuvarikayum durbbalanmaarkku kanivu labhikkukayum cheyyaname. Paapikallude kadangall kshamikkappedaname. Vishvaasikallaaya vaangippoyavarkku karuna labhikkaname. Adharmmikallaaya manushyarude dushdathayil ninnum karunayillaattha adhikaarikallude peedanangallilninnum parishuddhasabhayum athinte makkallum samrakshikkappedaname. Shuddhimathiyaaya maathaave! Keertthiyullllathum suprasiddhavumaaya ninte parishuddhathaye sameepikkunna sakalarilninnum drohikallude nottatthe pintirippikkuvaan ninte ekaputhranodu apekshikkename. Ninte praarththhanayaal nirantaramaayum ellaakkaalatthum daivakarunayaakunna kotta avare chuttukayum daivakrpayaakunna yavanika avare maraykkukayum avar vijayikallaayittheerukayum cheyyumaaraakatte. Rahasyavum parasyavumaaya shathrukkallude dushdathayilninnum avar vimuktharaakaname. Avarum balaheenaraaya nyangallum, sannihitharaayirikkunna pattakkaarum shemmaashanmaarum, shushrooshakarum sheshamulllla sakala janangallum kaatthukollllappedaname. Nyangall moonnu praavashyam kuriyelaayisson ennu uchatthil parayunnu.
(anantaram pattakkaaran kizhakkottu thirinyu balipeedhatthinte mumpaake chennuninnukondu bovusaa chollunnu.)

Kartthaavaam mashihaa nyangall than-srashdaave! Naathhaa
Krpa cheytheedaname nin maathaa-vin praarththhana moolam
Paishaachika pathanatthil ninnum-dursenakalleennum mochanamekaname, nyangalle sam-rakshicheedaname.
/tninna-diyaar nyangall
/tthrkkaiyil mevu-
/tnnarththhi-kkunnu daya
/taalambam nee thanne.
Nyangallkkum naathhaa nyangall than - vigatharkkum nalka
Kshamayum punyamathum paripoornna-paapavimochanavum.
(anantaram thaazhe kodutthirikkunna apekshakall oronnum randu goodaakallaayi ayyanchu praavashyam chollunnu.)
Pattakkaaran:- kuriyelayison. Kuriyelaayison. Kuriye ... Kuriye ... Kuriye ...
Janam: - naathhaa! Arulli... Naathhaa.. Naathhaa... Naathhaa...Naathhaa...
Janam: - nyangallude kartthaave ninakku sthuthi. Ennekkum nyangallude sharanavume ninakku sthuthi. Baarekmor.
(pattakkaaran padinyaarottu thirinyu ellaavareyum aasheervvadicha shesham nerchakkaare kai mutthikkunnu.)
